Package com.foreach.across.core.context.bootstrap

Interface BootstrapApplicationContextFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
AnnotationConfigBootstrapApplicationContextFactory, WebBootstrapApplicationContextFactory
public interface BootstrapApplicationContextFactory
In charge of creating the ApplicationContext and loading all the beans.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    AcrossConfigurableApplicationContext
    createApplicationContext()
    Create a new ApplicationContext instance that support Across context behavior.
    AcrossConfigurableApplicationContext
    createApplicationContext(AcrossContext across, ModuleBootstrapConfig moduleBootstrapConfig, AcrossApplicationContextHolder parentContext)
    Create the Spring ApplicationContext for a particular AcrossModule.
    AcrossConfigurableApplicationContext
    createApplicationContext(AcrossContext across, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext parentApplicationContext)
    Create the Spring ApplicationContext for the root of the AcrossContext.
    AcrossConfigurableApplicationContext
    createInstallerContext()
    Create a new ApplicationContext for running installers, it should support immediate registration of bean definitions and singletons (eg AcrossApplicationContext).
    void
    loadApplicationContext(AcrossContext across, AcrossApplicationContextHolder context)
    Loads beans and definitions in the root ApplicationContext.
    void
    loadApplicationContext(AcrossContext across, ModuleBootstrapConfig moduleBootstrapConfig, AcrossApplicationContextHolder context)
    Loads beans and definitions in the module ApplicationContext.
    void
    loadApplicationContext(AcrossConfigurableApplicationContext context, Collection<ApplicationContextConfigurer> configurers, Collection<ExposedModuleBeanRegistry> exposedBeanRegistries)
    Loads a set of configurers into an ApplicationContext.

  • Method Details

    • createApplicationContext

      AcrossConfigurableApplicationContext createApplicationContext()
      Create a new ApplicationContext instance that support Across context behavior.
      Returns:
      Spring ApplicationContext instance implementing AcrossConfigurableApplicationContext.

    • createInstallerContext

      AcrossConfigurableApplicationContext createInstallerContext()
      Create a new ApplicationContext for running installers, it should support immediate registration of bean definitions and singletons (eg AcrossApplicationContext).
      Returns:
      Spring ApplicationContext instance implementing AcrossConfigurableApplicationContext.

    • createApplicationContext

      AcrossConfigurableApplicationContext createApplicationContext(AcrossContext across, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext parentApplicationContext)
      Create the Spring ApplicationContext for the root of the AcrossContext. Optionally a parent ApplicationContext can be specified and a map of singletons that are guaranteed to be available when the ApplicationContext has been created.
      Parameters:
      across - AcrossContext being created.
      parentApplicationContext - Parent ApplicationContext, can be null.
      Returns:
      Spring ApplicationContext instance implementing AcrossConfigurableApplicationContext.

    • createApplicationContext

      AcrossConfigurableApplicationContext createApplicationContext(AcrossContext across, ModuleBootstrapConfig moduleBootstrapConfig, AcrossApplicationContextHolder parentContext)
      Create the Spring ApplicationContext for a particular AcrossModule.
      Parameters:
      across - AcrossContext being loaded.
      moduleBootstrapConfig - Bootstrap configuration of the AcrossModule being created.
      parentContext - Contains the parent context.
      Returns:
      Spring ApplicationContext instance implementing AcrossConfigurableApplicationContext.

    • loadApplicationContext

      void loadApplicationContext(AcrossContext across, AcrossApplicationContextHolder context)
      Loads beans and definitions in the root ApplicationContext.
      Parameters:
      across - AcrossContext being loaded.
      context - Contains the root Spring ApplicationContext.

    • loadApplicationContext

      void loadApplicationContext(AcrossContext across, ModuleBootstrapConfig moduleBootstrapConfig, AcrossApplicationContextHolder context)
      Loads beans and definitions in the module ApplicationContext.
      Parameters:
      across - AcrossContext being loaded.
      moduleBootstrapConfig - Bootstrap configuration of the AcrossModule being loaded.
      context - Contains the Spring ApplicationContext for the module.

    • loadApplicationContext

      void loadApplicationContext(AcrossConfigurableApplicationContext context, Collection<ApplicationContextConfigurer> configurers, Collection<ExposedModuleBeanRegistry> exposedBeanRegistries)
      Loads a set of configurers into an ApplicationContext.
      Parameters:
      context - Configurable application context
      configurers - Configurers to apply
      exposedBeanRegistries -
